* Tested with Wordpress 6.0.2
* Tested with WooCommerce 7.0.0

= 0.63 =
* Small change in notification when the plugin is started for the very first time

= 0.62 =
* More changes to meet the Wordpress Review Guidelines
* Hide Categories/Products Select box when previewing

= 0.60 =
* Changed code to Wordpress Review Guidelines
* Removed bootstrap, bootstrap-multiselect and chosen libraries and included own coded selection for categories and products
* Removed fontawesome and included images where needed
* Fixed Typo in code preventing lower price to be highlited

* Initial version
